<title level="1" right="Trait">[Tandem](/Traits.aspx?ID=395)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 57 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Actions with this trait involve you and your eidolon acting in concert. You can't use a tandem action if either you or your eidolon can't act, if you haven't [Manifested your Eidolon](/Actions.aspx?ID=757), or if you've Manifested your Eidolon in a way where it isn't a separate entity (such as with the [Meld into Eidolon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2892) feat). Tandem actions often let both you and your eidolon take separate actions, but these must be actions taken separately by you and your eidolon; you can't use a tandem action to take another tandem action.
name: Tandem
